column1: Little Goat Diner////After a wait at the cute coffee bar next door
column2: where we got two pretty-good drinks
column3: we headed over to the diner for a just-alright brunch. Perhaps starting off on the wrong foot
column4: the service was only lukewarm from the beginning onward: Our waitress ran by to tell us she'd be right with us. And then again to say she'd be "right with us" a second time (Hey
